plot outline: Swantham Malavika is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jagadeesh Chandran and Produced by Prabhettan. The film stars Vijayaraghavan, Manya, Rajan P. Dev, Rajesh Rajan and Menon Gopi in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Kaithapram.
title: Swantham Malavika
plot: _Swantham Malavika_ (qv) is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jagadeesh Chandran and Produced by Prabhettan. The film stars Vijayaraghavan, Manya, Rajan P. Dev, Rajesh Rajan and Menon Gopi in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Kaithapram.
